ud5.8:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ud5.8:1.3: Now at that time Venerable Ānanda robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, entered Rājagaha for alms.
ud5.8:2.1: Devadatta saw him wandering for alms in Rājagaha.
